nice place to sit and relax .
output.sentences: My husband and I took a trip to another country.
By bus we got to see the marvelous city and it's bustling atmosphere.
The city featured downtown carriage rides, street vendors and street cafes.
There were plenty of attractions and historic sites to see.
Night-time in the country was beautiful and lit up like stars.
